    pfs="Standard"
>
[Force Shield](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2820)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=721" />
<trait label="Force" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=610" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 234 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 650 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Shield** [Steel Shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=19)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The edges of this elaborately engraved steel shield (Hardness 8, HP 32, BT 16) bear tiny glass tiles set in mosaic patterns.

**Activate—Force Bubble** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [force](/Traits.aspx?ID=610)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** The shield surrounds you with a bubble of force that protects you from harm, granting you resistance 5 to physical damage for 1 minute. The activation ends if you cease holding the shield. 

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Force Shield
